website_summaries.verdict: This versatile plug adapter is a good choice for the frequent traveler and comes with its own traveling case.
pros: Can be used in US, Euro, UK and Australian outlets
Holds up well even after being tossed around in a suitcase
cons: Some have said that this adapter has a tendency to fall out of the wall

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year for my trip to the UK and Europe since it can work on both systems and it was great! I actually still use it in the states to charge my iPad since it sends a stronger electrical current then some of the other chargers I have. Only negative thing I would have to say is that sometimes its hard to place it into some sockets since the prongs tend to retract when there is too much force and the button on top doesn't always lock in place, but once you get it in and don't pull on it, you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Polina

customer_reviews.title: did not fit into the circular plugs in Israel
customer_reviews.text: my roommate had an adapter that could be used in Israel so we plugged hers in and plugged mine into hers since we needed areas for 3 plugs - worked fine doing that but it is not universal
customer_reviews.author: Pete Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly in my Prague hotel outlet
customer_reviews.text: I used this every day in Prague to charge my phone and tablet. I used the regular plug for my phone and the side USB for my tablet. The side USB charged much more slowly, so just keep that in mind if charging more than one thing at a time. The rounded part fit perfectly in the recessed outlet in the hotel and stayed secure. I also love the little case. Nice touch for packing. I bought another adapter but never used it - I stuck with this one the entire 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mazur

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: there are so many seemingly identical products, but this IS actually better. the subtle differences in this compared to the others makes this better. some plugs have multiple parts, and flipping one out will trigger the corresponding part to come out too. it's so nice!! my other one--you have to take each part out manually. what a waste of time right ;-). also has a nice softish rubber/plastic feel in some areas. I'm not sure how to explain how this thing is better than the others, but it just is.
customer_reviews.author: ichiroku

customer_reviews.title: Supports multiple regions. Two USB ports. Comes with a case.
customer_reviews.text: I recently traveled to Australia from the US and needed a universal power plug adapter to use my existing devices there. After tons of research I went with the LKY Digital Travel adapter and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Not only does the product work as advertised but it also is the last travel adapter I’ll ever need since it supports all plug types. Additionally, the two USB charging ports came in handy when the need to charge both my laptop and cell phone arrised. The case that the adapter comes with is also an added bonus. I would recommend this travel adapter to anyone who has the need for one.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Gammel

customer_reviews.title: Great little product!
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from Scotland. I was able to keep my phone, reader and extra battery all charged up. Most hotels and B&Bs have plugs but no USB ports. Even the newer ones. Go prepared. Plus I can use this in Europe and Asia. Great value. It comes with a very nice case. It’s also very light and doesn’t take up a lot of space in your baggage.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Adapter for International Travel
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for our trip to Europe. Gave us versatility with multiple plus built all in one. The two USB ports were perfect for charging phones and my running watch. My wife used this ADAPTER, with her dual voltage hair dryer and curling iron without issue. This ISNT a CONVERTER. Size was great for tossing in my carry on. Highly recommend at least one if traveling over seas.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel adapter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent travel adapter. I used it in Italy and Germany for 11 days. The two USB ports are good for phones and other low power devices, but don't provide enough power to charge tablets and such. Use the power "brick" that came with your tablet and plug into the 120VAC receptacle on the face of the LKY unit. I simultaneously charged iPhone, iPod Touch, and Samsung tablet using this method and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce and Ann

customer_reviews.title: Universal Wall Adapter Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: We needed a universal wall adapter for our trip to Europe. We liked that this adapter had surge protection as well. (There was a thunder storm one night!) We used this adapter for charging our mobile devices and had no issues. (Bonus) I also liked that the adapter came with a nice zipper case included! Very nice for storage and protection of the adapter.
customer_reviews.author: VICKI L BACON

customer_reviews.title: but anyway it still work and im good with that
customer_reviews.text: i normally travel to UK, and this thing saves me when i need to charge my tablet, laptop and phone together. the only concern is that it gets​ really hot, but i don't know if it because of the power range in UK (is higher potency) or what.... but anyway it still work and im good with that. it saves you in the airports too, especially when you need to make some transfers in other countries
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Then

customer_reviews.title: Good for everything except heavy MacBook chargers, still highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This came in so handy during a week in Europe. It came with a small hard case that protects it. We used it to charge iphones, kindles, electric toothbrush, portable batteries, but it did not do well in charging a couple MacBooks. It is very lightweight, which is easy to carry but not so good for supporting heavy laptop chargers (see pic), as the European outlets are deeper set, so the weight pulls it out of the socket. We had to put something underneath to support it. Still highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabert

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as advertised. It worked in multiple places (Hotel, Train, Airport) and never failed us once. Also, I love the little faux leather case that it comes with! Buy the way, we also brought another converter that we bought from Brookstone for about 3x the price. The Brookstone device died hald way into our vacation. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Chicken

customer_reviews.title: Such an inventive gadget for people traveling through Europe and Australia and Japan. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Such an ingenious tool. First it is very well package, very sturdy box. And then you have all the plugs you may need in one. You have one each USB for either Apple or Android product. I am taking more items that need USBs than plug in (i.e. curling iron). Compared to what I had to carry years ago, it is absolutely perfect. Lightening up the suitcase, just great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerRosieM

customer_reviews.title: My husband used this for two weeks across several European ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this for two weeks across several European countries. it worked well charging a,, iPhone 6s+ & No problems encountered, my husband's only regret was not purchasing the adapter with 4 USB outlets
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great compact easy to use charger for plugs and USB.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on our trip to Italy. It had the dual port USB chargers which worked well for phones and ipads. It was also able to run my wife's hair straightener which pulls plenty of power. It's also nice and small as well so convenient all around. The only thing that's a little tricky is getting the plug out on the back sometimes but not tricky enough to deduct a star. Would certainly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: William E. Kendust

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and saves time
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well when I went to London and Barcelona! I just used it recently for about a week and it’s awesome because you can plug 2 things using the 2 usb outlets and also use the regular adapter to charge an iPad or laptop! You can charge 3 things at once so it’s really worth it plus the case is nice as well to protect the charger!
customer_reviews.author: Aggie Serrame

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I shared this converter on a recent trip to Ireland, and it worked well for all our needs. We both used cell phones and Kindles on the trip and we were able to share the use of this and never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: George M

customer_reviews.title: Great travel adapter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this travel adapter because I was going on a trip to Peru. I like that you can use this product in many countries and that it has built in USB ports. The only issue that I had was that the adapter was loose if the wall receptacles were installed sideways. I was still able to use it but I was concerned that it was going to fall off the wall so it would be nice if the prongs on the adapter would rotate in order to accommodate sideway receptacles.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: It is  compact and easy to use. It works well
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of devices to use in various countries. And, there are so many different kinds of plugs. I wanted something simple, without parts. This was it. It does what it is supposed to do. The documentation on what plugs worked where proved to be accurate. Like others, I suppose, I was nervous about plugging my 120 volt stuff into a 220 line but that is a function of the device and its power supply, not this plug adapter. I don't think I own anything anymore that will not adjust for current on its own. But, that is just me. Check your devices.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Hodge

customer_reviews.title: First use was in the US it was ok but then it stopped properly.
customer_reviews.text: The indicator light on the unit telling you if it was live was very helpful. The unit continued to stop working once items were plugged in. It did not stay set in the foreign socket properly. Very finicky, touchy I had to prop cords or other items under a side of the unit to get it to stay put, I shifted or played with it for a minute or two I could finally get it set in to work with USB cords, but there was no way to use a plug item because it wouldn't stay set in the socket. VERY FRUSTRATING to find an over night charge of your phone and I pad not working the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: jill d

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I also purchased another model should by another company due to it working with a curling iron. However this one work well thank god. Cause the other one was junk!! This one saved the day!! I wasn’t sure if it would work for hair dryer and curling iron and it does!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and expected. You can use this as a straight adapter or as a USB charger. I've charged battery backups, cell phones, and Bluetooth earphones both when this was plugged into a 110 volt outlet in the States and a 220 volt outlet in England. The 5-volt USB output is the same no matter the input voltage. Also in England I plugged my American dual voltage cell phone charger into the 110 volt side while it was plugged into 220v, and my Motorola Turbo Charge function still worked. Excellent choice for travel, Compact and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not So WORLDWIDE after all.
customer_reviews.text: This did NOT work in Italy. So sorry I bought it and packed it!
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver - a must when travelling abroad
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolute lifesaver on my recent trip to the Netherlands. I had assumed that the hotel - a Marriott - would have at least one USB charging port, as the Marriotts in the US do. But, alas, no. I used this to charge my phone and my Kindle fire via USB, and used the plug in for my "Shabbos lamp". And to think that, at one point, I was thinking of returning it! I couldn't have managed for that week without this cute little device. Comes in a nice carrying case. Remember to bring a couple of good USB charging cables with you.
customer_reviews.author: Ex-Pat Brit

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I recently traveled to UAE, India, and Singapore and it works in all those countries. Also I LOVE the 2 USB charging ports. Before purchasing this I would need to bring my iPhone charger and Apple Watch charger, and now this thing takes care of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Hainan Xu

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I put this to use earlier this year., I used it in Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Belgium, London , and Scotland. Worked perfectly. Its very compact and weighs nothing,making it it perfect for travel. I only charged phones, powerbanks, and a gopro. My sister bought a different brand which took up more room and was heavier. But she needed more power for her curling iron and blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelio Bravo III

customer_reviews.title: This worked pretty well in London
customer_reviews.text: This worked pretty well in London, but when I tried to use it on the continent with the continental plugs, the light came on but when I tried to recharge my iPad, it would not work. As I recall, the light went out. So I am afraid I cannot recommend this product as a universal charger.
customer_reviews.author: Anglophiliac

customer_reviews.title: Great adapter... not a power converter (there’s a difference!)
customer_reviews.text: One trip in, this worked great for outlets in the EU (France). The two-prong plug was long enough to reach into the circular receptacles that are common. It wasn’t a super snug/tight fit, but the adapter is compact enough that it stayed in fine with two usb plugs and an Apple laptop plug attached. NOTE: READ THE DESCRIPTION. This is just an adaptor, not a power converter. It’s exactly what I want/need with just usb devices and a laptop, but if you have a hair dryer, electric shaver, or other device that requires 110v then you need to get a “power converter.” This is stayed very clearly in the product description. Know what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The converter works well, it is not the heaviest or most high quality material but it is does not feel cheap either. I think it does the job. However, like many converters with the same design, if you have a deep wall socket, this product will not work well as it does not have the design requirements to sink into non-flat socket chassis. The pouch is very good quality and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bishoy Louis

customer_reviews.title: Worked great with sunken European outlets
customer_reviews.text: This adaptor worked great. I used it on my recent trip to Morocco which has the sunken European outlets but the plug was long enough to fit in the outlet unlike some other brands which people have complained about. Also it was great that I could charge 3 devices at once. This was extremely helpful as friends lost/forgot those tiny multi piece adaptors and needed to use mine as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Small and simple
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our trip. It was small, easy to travel with, had a great case for it to keep it clean and safe even though it went through several airports. additionally, it worked with every place we went to, each of the prongs sliding out easily. Honestly, we loved it and we will continue to use it as we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover BLB

customer_reviews.title: Too large for UK AC sockets
customer_reviews.text: I used this in Malawi, Africa, which uses the UK style AC outlets. The problem is that the UK style AC outlet has a switch, and this adapter covers so much area on the outlet that it hits the switch, so the prongs will not fully seat and power can easily become intermittent. This is about the fifth foreign AC adapter I've purchased, and I still have to find one that works correctly or lasts more than a couple of trips overseas. This one is sturdy, but the switch issue makes it unreliable, so I regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Mac Plugs Beware
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for the USB portion of the adaptor. The product however, is too difficult to plug in actual plugs. Specifically, i have to force my mac plug into the surge protector. Does not guide in easy, I just struggled for over 20 minutes trying to guide the prongs in. Very irritating since I'm traveling for work and need this adapter to work.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I had one that I bought a few years ago from a different manufacture thay just stopped working. Everytime I plugged in my phone it would say "error connection issue" and would drain the battery instead of charging it. I have used this product so far in the USA and I do NOT have that problem!:) I will be taking it with me for 3 weeks to Europe so I will update then but so far so good! Also the company has been very friendly making sure everything is good!
customer_reviews.author: KayN

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good item one major issue when you plug it in and plug multiple items in it it sticks out too far and tends to want to come out of the socket the blue LED light location is also bright and bothers me when I'm sleeping it should be at the bottom so it works more like a night light and not be so bright maybe use a different color like silver or white not blue that can be seen from 20 feet away
customer_reviews.author: robert & anna

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend this adaptor!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine worked for 1 night in Europe and I was left for the entire 3 weeks borrowing a friends adaptor. When you plug the adaptor in it will fall down and it loses the charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: all in one compact travel adapter
customer_reviews.text: I needed a compact travel adapter for my Europe trip (my current one is over a decade old with separate plug heads for each region). For this trip, I will be bringing ipad, phones and camera so specifically look for a unit with several USB outlets. I also wanted a light compact unit that would not take too much room in my carry on. The retractable attractive design made packing easy for me. Also love that it allows me to use on my next Asia trip. Seems like a solid built although wish it could be a bit heavier to hold off the cords and multiple devices that will be plugged into it.
customer_reviews.author: Gaston Lagaffe

customer_reviews.title: Must have for international travelers - Don’t fly without this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone considering themselves an international traveler. It eliminates the need to bring all these plugs with you. All you need is this universal plug which is compact and can be converted to be used with most outlets in the world. The bonus for this plug is it has 2 UBS slots on the side for you to plug your iPhone or Android cables.
customer_reviews.author: Captain G

customer_reviews.title: No a single issue with it while traveling all over ...
customer_reviews.text: No a single issue with it while traveling all over Italy for almost a month. The only complaint I have was the flimsy European plug, wish there was a way to lock it in place as most of the time the main brick itself collapses on its own causing anything plugged into to not charge.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Velazco

customer_reviews.title: Failed to function : (
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find this compact adapter as we travel to Europe and Asia every year. This is much easier to carry around. Never thought that it will not function, we did not tested it when we received it on May 30. We are leaving for Europe next week so we took it out to charge our phone and pad, sadly, the ubs charging pots failed to charge any of our equipment. It is over 30 days, and we cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: A must have for world travellers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price, size and usability! I travel as often as I can and this combines any plug you'd need and has two USB ports. Took it to Australia last month, can use it at home and when I travel to see my stepfamily in Russia. Highly recommend this. It's well made
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L

customer_reviews.title: High quality adapter works all over the world
customer_reviews.text: High quality product made with hard plastic that is coated with a non slip flat coating. Slides work very smoothly to change to different types of plugs. Came with a nice semi hard, zipper case that fits the adapter perfectly. Outputs to 2 USB ports both 5v #1 for 1amp #2 for 2.1 amp. Can plug in a laptop charger that runs 110/240 with no ground ( blank space for 3rd prong) can also plug in many shaped plugs. Not a converter.
customer_reviews.author: Tjscali

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in Germany
customer_reviews.text: Having a USB charger that can work pretty much anywhere is handy and this product performed well for me on a recent trip to Germany. I'll carry it anytime I head out of the country, but it also worked in the Atlanta airport on the way, so it is a versatile little tool
customer_reviews.author: William Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Must have travel partner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this almost 15 months back. Still working good and a MUST have while traveling, especially to a different continent. Build quality is excellent. It has two USB charging ports which is super useful when you have limited port availability or when you forget your charger at home to charge your mobile or tablet. Overall satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chaitanya

customer_reviews.title: It does not convert voltage, it doesn’t claim to!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good product and works here in the USA. Some of the reviews may be tainted by a lack of understanding on how this works. It does not convert voltage and makes no claim to. If you plug this into 220 voltage like is often found overseas, you still have 220 coming out and will not be good for your 110 item that is plugged in. Read the info on your device your plugging in to see if it’s compatable. It may say 110-220 and if so your good to go with either voltage.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this, it's great for traveling. I used it in continental Europe and in the UK with no issues. Great thing about it is that it also has 2 direct into USB ports in addition to the regular ports so you could charge multiple devices at once :) It also comes in a nice case which is a little bonus
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Compact powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: This was/is terrific. I purchased this for a trip to the UK and Ireland. It came in its own small carrying case that took up almost no space on my luggage. The two USB ports came in handy so others in my travel party could share when charging electronic devices. They brought with them a huge cumbersome charger that wouldn't even power my flat iron for my hair. This little white charger had no problem doing that while both usb ports were actively in use. It's a little cheap feeling and not the sturdiest of plastics, but it stood up to all the abuse I showed it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie O'M

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact And Clever Electricity Adapter
customer_reviews.text: I liked the compactness of this product and how clever the plugs were designed especially the U.S. one that had movable prongs to satisfy being adaptable to different areas of the world. If all of your electrical products are dual voltage that makes this product even more useful since you only need to bring one compact, lightweight product with you to use your electrical products around the world. We bought this product recently for an upcoming trip next month. However, it sure seems like it will fit our needs while traveling. Shelly K.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Kimel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and have bought multiple adapters in the past. This is by far the best one I own. So convenient to have all common adapters in one small pack. I can charge multiple devices at once and it came with a nice case as well. This product made my life so much easier. It's easy to carry and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jinkshah

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for international travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right before I went on a long international trip, was helpful in Africa and Europe, I felt prepared for anywhere. It was also helpful that it had outlets for 2 USB cords AND an outlet to plug something else in. My family also appreciated it because there were always multiple people using it at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Thisby

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open Europe plug
customer_reviews.text: Nice converter device, but there's no button to open the eruopean plug from the back. You have to put a screwdriver or some skinny sharp implement under the plug and pry it up. The device seems well made, the case is nice, but I wonder why this oversight. The instruction booklet was useless
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Got a couple of these to use on our honeymoon trip through Europe, particularly since this has the two USB ports along with the single receptacle adapter. We were able to use these in our hotel room in Rome, on our cruise ship (using the standard US plug), and in our hotel room in Paris.
customer_reviews.author: andrew vied

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Used it on our trip to London UK and it worked out great!! After looking at tons of reviews and different Universal Adapters, I decided to give this one a try and I'm glad I did. Loved the fact that I could use the USB port to charge my Bluetooth headphones and my regular phone charger at the same time. Carrying case a great added bonus and it is very compact. If you in the market for an adapter, look no further
customer_reviews.author: Shevon S

customer_reviews.title: Works Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I like that this adapter works on pretty much anywhere in the world. Great for Europe, Asia and Latin America. Highly recommended for world travelers.
customer_reviews.author: OneShot

customer_reviews.title: Handy item, good carrying case.
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well, but in Sri Lanka, where I was using it, the outlets have an on/off switch that would get covered by this item. And there are some outlets in that country that don’t work with any of the holes in this. So I was happy that I had this for sure, but if I go again I would get a few other types to carry along as well.
customer_reviews.author: empress of nippon

customer_reviews.title: All in one travel adapter
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, simple all-in-one design. No pieces to break or mis-place. Can be used in any country as long as your device is auto switching. Compact size, very convenient, great value and fast shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Toothy

customer_reviews.title: I was there for a week and probably spent a good hour and a half sitting on the floor trying ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product failed for my trip. IF I could manage to get it plugged in, it worked. However, I traveled to Abu Dhabi and both the hotel and the office had hard plastic guards inside the electrical socket holes and the pushed out prongs on the Converter would collapse upon trying to plug it in. I was there for a week and probably spent a good hour and a half sitting on the floor trying to get the converter plugged in. Since I've thrown away the packaging (it's just a converter, right?), I cannot return the item.
customer_reviews.author: DanBie

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly during a two-week trip to Europe (England, France, and Switzerland)! The small size/weight and carrying case made it convenient to throw both into my large travel backpack and small day bag. The USB ports came in handy, allowing both me and a friend to charge items at the same time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: katgirl8

customer_reviews.title: Travel adapter
customer_reviews.text: Have not traveled with this yet but seems it will work. Knocked it down a star as mine didn’t come with the case others said it did, which I was really looking forward to having for travel. Wish they would send me one
customer_reviews.author: B. Kleinman

customer_reviews.title: consolidates all adopters
customer_reviews.text: I have a bag full of adopters for all countries i go to - my daughter pointed out this product and it's a huge improvement. That said, won't be using it any time soon. But happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This travel adapter is one of the best I’ve seen. It’s nice and compact and even comes in it’s own case. I have no trouble charging my electronics when I travel internationally. It has two USB slots so that you can charge two devices at a time. There’s also a a red light to let you know that your device is indeed charging. If you travel a lot, or are planning to, look no further! This is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: Works very well in Paris
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger. It worked very well in Paris, charging my Samsung Phone quickly and I used it to charge my Kindle Fire. I had no issues with it. I loved that it came with a traveling case. The case is small and sturdy and keeps the charger neat and easy to pack. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, design and size
customer_reviews.text: Excellent adapter for USB charging smart phones and iPads in France and Italy. Although the adapter does NOT convert voltage the power sources (wall plug chargers) that came with our Samsung and Apple phones already handle either voltage so we could plug one into the front 2-prong while already using USB too.
customer_reviews.author: DVK

customer_reviews.title: Faulty plug, won’t stay extended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am traveling to the UK. I got here and now am trying to use it for the first time and the UK plug won’t stay extended, so it won’t work. Luckily I am traveling with someone who has a better adapter, otherwise I would have no way of charging my phone or computer.
customer_reviews.author: BTW

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed. We are from the USA and used it when traveling in Europe. Had no problems. Especially loved the extra USB outlets so we could plug something in and charge our phones at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Moss

customer_reviews.title: Useful travel adapter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it before my Europe trip and I used it a lot throughout. It was compatible everywhere and I loved the usb charging points too. Only problem I had when I connected heavy plugs like my laptop charger, then the adapter tends to fall off the outlet due to the weight. I just had to plug it back in and be mindful of that.
customer_reviews.author: Debapriya Basu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & perfect for International travel.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have when traveling to other countries. My family and I traveled to London last year and we were able to use the adapter to charge all of our devices while in London.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Christy Russell

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, small, and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Reliable. Used all throughout Europe (England and actual Europe = Italy). No problems. I've also use this same device in China (but I lost it so bought this one), and back then it was also reliable with their electrical grid and format structure.,
customer_reviews.author: E. Gurel

customer_reviews.title: LKY Digital Travel Adapter--Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping! High quality product that works very well! Easy to pack and carry! Best price on Amazon! Great customer service! Highly recommend if you are planning to travel in Europe or other countries! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: edman48

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little adapter for the price. I used it all across Europe: UK, Netherlands, Germany, Austria, Italy, Switzerland (it is compacted with their smaller plugs), and France. Does weigh a little more than expected, so will fall out of the wall at times when more than one thing is plugged in (Ex. Hair dryer and phone). And sometimes it wouldn’t stay in the UK plugs. Overall great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E.

customer_reviews.title: EU plug doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I am traveling in the EU now and trying to use this adapter. Unfortunately the EU plug doesn't work - it is loose and doesn't stay lifted. Because of this, it will work for about 5 seconds, the unit will start to fall and then stop working. Right now I've rigged it with a rubber band to keep it in place. Not sure how the other plugs work, I will keep testing it out as I travel. Big bummer though as you really don't know how well it works until you are in another country and try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Power Adapter & USB Charging
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed handy little plug adapter for any country and it has 2 USB charging ports (which is all we mostly use anymore). I like the power LED to let you know it is plugged in and the recepticle works. Also comes in a nice carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: This Travel Adapter is a Great Product - Good, Robust and Multi-Points
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this Universal Travel Adapter since Nov'2018. Since I need to travel a lot, I was searching for a good, robust Travel Adapter for long. Booked a single Adapter from Amazon in Nov'2018. I was so happy with this Adapter, I've bought 4 of them for my family. If anyone looking for a Travel Adapter, just try it once, you will never regret. The Cost of this Travel Adapter is also optimum. The Black and White mix color Adapter comes with a Cover Bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sevabrata Debnath

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Did great in Switzerland and Germany. Two USB's on the side allows you to use AC adapter for another USB if needed. We charged some small devices including a rechargeable travel flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: Lagniappe

customer_reviews.title: Works well but could use some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my time in a few different countries. I liked that it had many adapters so I didn’t have to buy multiple. The usb ports were also handy so we could charge a phone at the same time as doing something else. The little red light on top is helpful to know it’s working but super annoying because of how bright it is. The plug to plug the US cords into is very hard to use and you have to almost force the plug into it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Travelers Essential!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! I love to travel, so this is always with me on every single on of my trips!!! The item arrived directly as pictured!!! It even comes with a case. It is very useful in protecting it from scratches and damages!!
customer_reviews.author: Annmary Z.

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice and snug in US
customer_reviews.text: Indispensable on my recent trip to Ireland, the UK, and The Netherlands. Fits nice and snug in US, European, and UK outlets and kept all of my various electronic devices going.
customer_reviews.author: Luke A. Airoldi

customer_reviews.title: Seller very accommodating
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for our trip to Greece and found it helpful with the multiple USB ports to plug in multiple items. I bought 5 and gave them our teenagers to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: MC in CT

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but may be big for some outlets
customer_reviews.text: So i used it when i went to Europe but beware because in Europe some wall plugs have like a weird design where the holes are towards the inside of the plug and this plug may not fit properly (or it falls out) glad I had a mini backup.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use power adapter ~ great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I used this travel adapter for my trip to Croatia, Germany, Slovenia, Italy and Israel. It accommodated every type of plug we needed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Smith

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME
customer_reviews.text: I live in Africa and ordered it specially for my trip to USA and Canada, It worked really well and dual USB port is so convenient. It charge my cell phone and tablet very fast. Now am traveling to Turkey and Middle east and I am pretty sure it will work there as well. I wish I had it before
customer_reviews.author: KASS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Like that all my travel power needs can be met with just one small device. I am all about traveling with less luggage & every little bit helps.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Delana

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, one broke
customer_reviews.text: The plug got stuck inside. Could not get it out. Several people tried to fix it. Ended up junking it, which really sucks when you're on a 3 week vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for us
customer_reviews.text: Just used this recently on a trip to UK and France, and love being able to switch between the outlet styles for each. Having USB chargers on it was great. Worked as described!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia58

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and useful
customer_reviews.text: I recently traveled to Greece and needed the adapter. This adapter charged my phone without issue. It came in a very sturdy travel case and I love the versatility of it so that i can travel to other countries with it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This worked terrific in multiple European countries. It was very easy to use. I had no problems, and the little storage container that came with it is terrific. I also stuck my extra sd card in there for safe keeping. This item is very worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth C.

customer_reviews.title: It is a good travel adapter but you can connect only mobile or ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good travel adapter but you can connect only mobile or laptop. You can not charge your other thing like 220 v power supply. this thing suppose to mention.
customer_reviews.author: Dharmendra K.

customer_reviews.title: Universal Power Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Great power adapter for using in other countries. We used this adapter in Barcelona, Spain and Ireland. The adapter has two USB ports that are great for charging cell phones and fitbits. We used the adapter in flat and round sockets.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McDuffie

customer_reviews.title: Value, Convenience and Service!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my European trip to several different countries. It was great. This adapter has several charging ports for different European countries. We were able to charge two phones at once. I did try to charge my curling iron but it was too hot and melted the tip. However, if I had set it on low wattage, it was workable. I highly recommend this product for the ease of use, convenient carrying case and excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Babe782

customer_reviews.title: A must for traveling to Europe
customer_reviews.text: This adapter was perfect for my trip to Italy. Didn’t worry about myself phone or iPad while charging. Very handy to have
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Do

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a month now and it feels sturdier and more reliable than my old power adapter. Nothing too special I suppose-- just a basic, no-nonsense travel adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Retrench of space
customer_reviews.text: When I go on a trip I have to leave with more than 4 chargers for my cell phone and table. now with a single charger I solve everything, I recommend it, I can go out trusting only with the usb cable and this device.
customer_reviews.author: GINCSRL

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried multiple different converters over the years and by far this is the best one I’ve used. I have an Australian laptop and most of the converters I’ve used in the past fall out of the outlet. This particular converter was easy to set up and very stable in outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect universal adapter
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. I love that it is a three prong outlet and has two USB outlets. I can charge all of my electronics at once. And it has a really nice and durable carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Useful, Durable, Versatile - a Travel MUST
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for any traveler that goes abroad should have. It has versatility, is much more lightweight and durable than other similar products. I got it for my trip to Spain and found it was adequate and even fit in the smaller sized outlets, and found it handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 star rating except for the time it stopped working for a while. It may have a built-in breaker when it gets too hot or something. It wouldn't work one night but then did again in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: S L.

customer_reviews.title: Working fine in Germany.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in Germany currently and it has been working well for her. Haven’t heard of any problems. Just got it for this trip so can’t really rate it on durability and such.
customer_reviews.author: Reforming Clutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Worked well in Europe and England
customer_reviews.text: Used in France and England for US plugs & USBs. Worked well, no issues. Nice and small. Great carrying case. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for travel
customer_reviews.text: Traveled to France. It worked perfectly. It was nice it has its own case so it was easy to locate in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: RACHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy
customer_reviews.text: This adapter works. Did not burn out any of my appliances and worked amazing during my travels. If going abroad I would recommend to get this worked all over Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Bavila

product_meta.title: Travel Adapter, Worldwide All in One Universal Power Adapter AC Plug International Wall Charger with Dual USB Charging Ports for US EU UK AUS Europe Cell Phone (White)
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteNote: 
1.The travel adapter is not suited for high-powered electrical appliances such as hair staightener, flat iron, hair curler, hair dryer, coffee maker, etc.
2.This travel plug charger adapter is not a power converter and does not convert voltage.

FEATURES:
- AC Power Rating: 6A max, 100 - 240Vac (660W max at 110V; 1380W max at 240V)
- 2 USB Output: 5Vdc 
- Integrated Fuse & Travel Pouch Included 
- Built-in Safety Shutters 
- LED Power Indicator

US Type - USA, Japan
American Samoa / Antigua and Barbuda / Aruba / Bahamas / Barbados / Belize / Bermuda / Brazil / Canada / Cayman Islands / Colombia / Costa Rica / Cuba / Ecuador / El Salvador / Guam / Guatemala / Haiti / Honduras / Jamaica / Japan / Laos / Liberia / Mexico / Micronesia / Montserrat / Nicaragua / Panama / Peru / Philippines / Puerto Rico / Saudi Arabia / Taiwan / Thailand / Venezuela

AU Type - Australia, China
Argentina / Australia / China / Fiji / New Zealand / Papua New Guinea / Tokelau / Uruguay

EU Type - Most of Europe
Albania / Austria / Belgium / Bosnia-Herzegovina / Bulgaria / Cambodia / Croatia / Czech Republic / Denmark / Egypt / Estonia / Finland / France / Greece / Hungary / Iceland / Indonesia / Latvia / Lithuania / Luxembourg / Macedonia / Montenegro / Morocco / Myanmar / Norway / Netherlands / Poland / Portugal / Romania / Russia / Serbia / Spain / Slovakia / Slovenia / South Korea / Sweden / Turkey / Ukraine / Vietnam

UK Type - UK, Hong Kong
Bhutan / Botswana / Brunei / Cyprus / Dominica / England / Ghana / Grenada / Hong Kong / India / Iraq / Ireland / Kenya / Macau / Malta / Malaysia / Nigeria / Northern Ireland / Pakistan/ Qatar / Saint Lucia / Saint Vincent / Saudi Arabia / Scotland / Singapore / Sri Lanka / Tanzania / Uganda / United Arab Emirates / Wales / Yemen / Zimbabwe

12 Monthes Product Warranty
Please feel free to contact us with any questions.
feature_bullets: INTERNATIONAL COMPATIBILITY - Built to be the MUST HAVE Travel Accessories you need for your worldwide traveling, International Universal Travel Adaptor offers superior compatibility with more than 150 countries around the world, Solve your global travel charging problem.
DUAL USB CHARGING PORTS - World Adapter Plug compatible with almost all USB Devices like Apple iPhone, SAMSUNG, Motorola, Sony, Blackberry, HTC, LG, and so on.

AC POWER SOCKET - This is not a voltage converter. The AC output will be local voltage you're using, eg: In 110 countries, AC power socket output 110V. In 220V countries, AC power socket output 220V. Make sure your device with dual voltage or it is available at local voltage.

SPECIFICATIONS - Power Rating 6A max, 100 - 240Vac (660W max at 110Vac; 1300W max at 240Vac). The travel adapter does not work with high power appliances which higher than 660W at 110V, such as flat iron, hair dryer, steam iron, hot water heater, coffee maker, etc.

SAFETY PROTECTION - Our products are FCC CE and RoHS Certified. Built-in Fuse protect / Built-in Safety Shutters / LED Power Indicator and an 12-Month Warranty. Your device is safe and your investment is worth.
